entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 09:41 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.3°C
Pressure: 99.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -14.7°C
Wind: SW 32 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
